Question.Subject: Lockerz Redemption Day questions....?
Question.Content: -when is redemption day for march? -will there be certain time for the redemption? -im trynna get nano ipod but will it be gone when i come in ___ (how many minutes late????)
Question.ChosenAnswer:
around march 26-30.
They choose a random times for the redemption's I suggest you to use LockerzAlerts - http://www.lockerzalerts.com service , they will send you text message to your mobile phone when the redemption occurs ! its also FREE !
